channel.title: Notification Webhooks (experimental) on DefectDojo Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Notification Webhooks (experimental) on DefectDojo Documentation

item.title: Notification Webhooks Setup
item.description: Webhooks are HTTP requests coming from the DefectDojo instance towards a user-defined webserver which expects this kind of incoming traffic.

item.title: Event: product_type_added
item.description: Event HTTP header X-DefectDojo-Event: product_type_added Event HTTP body { "description": "", "title": "", "product_type": { "id": 4, "name": "notif prod type", "url_api": "http://localhost:8080/api/v2/product_types/4/", "url_ui": "http://localhost:8080/product/type/4" }, "url_api": "http://localhost:8080/api/v2/product_types/4/", "url_ui": "http://localhost:8080/product/type/4", "user": null }

item.title: Event: product_added
item.description: Event HTTP header X-DefectDojo-Event: product_added Event HTTP body { "description": "", "title": "", "product": { "id": 4, "name": "notif prod", "url_api": "http://localhost:8080/api/v2/products/4/", "url_ui": "http://localhost:8080/product/4" }, "product_type": { "id": 4, "name": "notif prod type", "url_api": "http://localhost:8080/api/v2/product_types/4/", "url_ui": "http://localhost:8080/product/type/4" }, "url_api": "http://localhost:8080/api/v2/products/4/", "url_ui": "http://localhost:8080/product/4", "user": null }

item.title: Event: engagement_added
item.description: Event HTTP header X-DefectDojo-Event: engagement_added Event HTTP body { "description": "", "title": "", "engagement": { "id": 7, "name": "notif eng", "url_api": "http://localhost:8080/api/v2/engagements/7/", "url_ui": "http://localhost:8080/engagement/7" }, "product": { "id": 4, "name": "notif prod", "url_api": "http://localhost:8080/api/v2/products/4/", "url_ui": "http://localhost:8080/product/4" }, "product_type": { "id": 4, "name": "notif prod type", "url_api": "http://localhost:8080/api/v2/product_types/4/", "url_ui": "http://localhost:8080/product/type/4" }, "url_api": "http://localhost:8080/api/v2/engagements/7/", "url_ui": "http://localhost:8080/engagement/7", "user": null }

item.title: Event: test_added
item.description: Event HTTP header X-DefectDojo-Event: test_added Event HTTP body { "description": "", "title": "", "engagement": { "id": 7, "name": "notif eng", "url_api": "http://localhost:8080/api/v2/engagements/7/", "url_ui": "http://localhost:8080/engagement/7" }, "product": { "id": 4, "name": "notif prod", "url_api": "http://localhost:8080/api/v2/products/4/", "url_ui": "http://localhost:8080/product/4" }, "product_type": { "id": 4, "name": "notif prod type", "url_api": "http://localhost:8080/api/v2/product_types/4/", "url_ui": "http://localhost:8080/product/type/4" }, "test": { "id": 90, "title": "notif test", "url_api": "http://localhost:8080/api/v2/tests/90/", "url_ui": "http://localhost:8080/test/90" }, "url_api": "http://localhost:8080/api/v2/tests/90/", "url_ui": "http://localhost:8080/test/90", "user": null }

item.title: Event: scan_added and scan_added_empty
item.description: Event scan_added_empty describes a situation when reimport did not affect the existing test (no finding has been created or closed).

item.title: Event: ping
item.description: An event ping is sent during Webhook setup to test whether the endpoint is up and responding with the expected status code.
